TopicTitle: This is not going to end well...

Articles.Content:
"Go on Bob, jump. It's probably fun in there!"

"Umm, after you, Jeb"...

(I've already forgotten just what I was trying to make here).

Edited November 15, 2015 by Foxster

I tried making a kerbal cannon this way. you have to turn off the heating otherwise they die immediately. I can only get them up to 674m. Its even more fun angling the muzzle and landing him back inside the tube for another shot.

I tried making a kerbal cannon this way. you have to turn off the heating otherwise they die immediately. I can only get them up to 674m. Its even more fun angling the muzzle and landing him back inside the tube for another shot.
Yea, spotted that. When they jump in and the engine isn't set high enough then the poor Kerbal gets converted into a puff of grey smoke.

If it is high enough then they shoot up into the air and, as you say, they can drop just right and go around again.
